subject: Unit Testing JSPs with Beans
msgSnippet: I m anything but a JSP guru.  I m looking at ways to invoke a JSP for testing (I know about J2EEUnit).  It seems to be that the  tag is likely to make
messageBody:
I'm anything but a JSP guru. I'm looking at ways to invoke a JSP for
testing (I know about J2EEUnit). It seems to be that the <usebean> tag
is likely to make it difficult to unitTest the JSP. That is, what I
want to make the beans be MockBeans. Can anyone here make any useful
comments about this? Am I right? Do you have a solution?

Thanks.
--
David Corbin
dcorbin@...
